basics.name: Ahron Natividad
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

work.company: UH Department of Indo-Pacific Languages & Literature (IPLL)
highlights: Assists faculty in daily clerical needs
Creation of promotional material for the department programs
Provides quick and accurate customer service
Effectively communicates with customers and other employees
Able to multitask during rush hours

volunteer.summary: Teaching 6th - 12th graders on basic web development fundamentals like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
highlights: Train new mentors to prepare them for mentoring during the spring semester

volunteer.summary: Assisting the TA as well as helping students with ICS 141/ICS 241 discrete math topics for CS.
highlights: Provided contact hours for those who need additional help after class
Learned about computing ethics in ICS 390
Breaking down difficult concepts for students

awards.title: Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Merit Scholarship awarded to recognize incoming freshmen students enrolling in UH Manoa with a very strong academic high school record.
